description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing FileAttachment entities, enabling database operations related to file attachments associated with invoices or partners.

classes.name: FileAttachmentRepository
classes.description: A repository interface for CRUD operations on FileAttachment entities, with custom query methods to find attachments by invoice or partner.

methods.name: findByInvoice
methods.description: Retrieves a list of FileAttachment objects linked to a specific Invoice.

methods.name: findByPartner
methods.description: Retrieves a list of FileAttachment objects linked to a specific Partner.
